commit_message:
update Deseq_Report.Rmd.in to fix error:

Error in `if (annotGene != "None") ...`:
! the condition has length > 1
fix missing genome hash for spike-in and be more explicit with the args

Modified syntax of commit to fix figure 8.1 for coherence.

Fix required for figure '8.1 Frequency of reads in peaks'. Added a line to Sample_Report.rmd.in that renames values of the column dd to match the names of the values of the column dd (removes 'sorted.bam' from the names.).
Fixes required for figure '6.1 GC Content Distribution Per Sample'. Added dependency for R library hexbin to files configure.ac and README.md, loading of library hexbin in Sample_Report.rmd.in.
Use common launcher script from pigx-common.

Rename snakefile.

This is the first step towards using the common launcher script from
pigx-common.

Capture R_LIBS_SITE and PYTHONPATH at configure time.

Restore these variables at runtime both for cluster submission and
local execution.  Remove "-V" flag from "qsub" command line to control
the environment more accurately with a jobscript template.

Only pass environment variables that have been modified by the driver
script (PATH and R_LIBS_USER) and GUIX_LOCPATH for convenience.
